<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Contortionist](/Feats.aspx?ID=6241) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 183 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=236)

**Prerequisites**
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6240)

</column>

---

You can squeeze out of tight situations by twisting and bending your body into unnatural positions, gaining an advantage against foes that try to pin you down. You gain the [Quick Squeeze](/Feats.aspx?ID=5199) skill feat, and if you're a master in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34), you can Squeeze at full Speed. Whenever you successfully [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296) using Acrobatics, the creature you Escaped from is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) against the next attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.
name: Contortionist
